website_summaries.verdict: It's a bit of a splurge, but this space-age-looking baby swing provides five different motions that babies love: car ride, swing, kangaroo, rockabye, and wave. These are similar to the movements parents instinctively make to soothe a fussy baby.
pros: You can control the swing's motion, sound, speed, and volume from your Bluetooth-compatible device
Play four soothing sounds or your own playlist for baby's enjoyment
Recline is fully adjustable so baby can lie flat or sit up
Three overhead toys for baby's eye tracking stimulation
cons: Not every baby enjoys the mild motions of this swing

website_summaries.verdict: This Bluetooth-enabled rocker is pricey, but it sports some fantastic features you won't find in other rockers.
pros: Offers 5 one-of-a-kind motions including car ride, rock-a-bye, tree swing, kangaroo, and wave
Comes with four built-in audio effects
All settings can be controlled via a Bluetooth-enabled device
cons: It's expensive and there's no guarantee that your baby will love it as much as you do

customer_reviews.title: The fact that I am able to sit at my ...
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I am able to sit at my computer and write this review alone means this is worth 5 stars. My newborn has not slept without being held since we first brought him home from the hospital. He is currently asleep five minutes after putting him into the 4moms mamaRoo infant seat. I would have paid 5 times this price for him to be able to be soothed. Stop reading this review and buy this if you can afford to, if not mortgage your house, sell your car. It is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Booga's Mummy

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am happy with the product and baby enjoys it as well
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with the product and baby enjoys it as well. My only complaint is the sound button on the base has stopped working (within the 1st week of owning) therefore I cannot play any music—for a 200 dollar baby swing this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wills

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my daughter who had twins! Life saver for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Super chic, small
customer_reviews.text: Super chic, small, and compact - one would think this was a miracle product, but neither of my babies liked it. I keep hearing this over and over from other new moms. As much as I would have loved this product with its smart design and smooth movements, babies don’t seem to respond well to it and it does nkt keep them calm or soothed. Its also very pricey! For a sure way to make babies happy stick to the good old fashioned Fischer Price swings!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A little shaky
customer_reviews.text: We love this swing. I would have gave it 5 stars but the movement can be shaky. Our baby doesn't seem to mind that the movement isn't perfectly smooth. At the price point it's set at I expected it to be smooth movement.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: SOON AS I put my 1 month old little guy in it, he stopped "air swimming." ( flailing arms and legs), not too long after that, his eyes were closed. Usually that only happens when I pick him up. So I hold him most of the time...UNTIL TODAY. I am very happy with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Antonette

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but was pretty useless, I ended up returning it after 2 uses. The top part has no movement so the baby would sit there staring at nothing. I pulled out a old Fisher price swing they run a little cheaper but have a large footprint. I would not recommend this unit for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe?
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product, so many issues. First the seat material was torn, then the strapped was frayed and now the motor is slipping. We only had it for 6 months and used it only once in a while. They told me no refunds. Very disappointed and feel this is an unsafe product and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used it for 2 days and we love it. on the 3rd day
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 2 days and we love it. on the 3rd day, the right arrow (change movement) button does not function anymore :( Pressing the minus button below does the job (it makes the “change movement”), in effect, lowering speed is no longer possible. Hope 4moms can help with this!!
customer_reviews.author: awwlene

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned the swing because it started making an awful grinding noise.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN F.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: We recieved this as a gift from my mother in law for our newborn and she absolutely LOVES it. The newborn insert holds her in snuggly and softly, the motion options are smooth, and sounds are calming. The fabric is super easy to remove for washing and I love that you can adjust the seating position. With our traditional bouncer she always seemed to slide down even with the seatbelt on snug. Thankfully we do not have that issue with this bouncer. She falls asleep in just a few minutes we are so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Chyrl

customer_reviews.title: Just order it new
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this “open box—like new.” To me, this is not “like new.” The strap is stained with what looks like smoke(?) and the mobile doesn’t stand up. There were also a few animal hairs on the mobile balls and the mamaroo itself. It works great though, which is what is most important, I suppose. The sound quality is terrible tbh, but that’s not important to me. Overall, I am very excited about the product itself. $150 wasn’t bad, but I wish I had just spent the extra $30 and had a brand new one with no stains and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Does what it says. Baby just didn’t care for it.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it’s going to do. It’s super easy to put together and the movements are really smooth. The Bluetooth is convenient as well. If your baby likes it, I say worth every penny. Mine just doesn’t care for it and I can’t justify keeping it for an “eh” reaction from baby. Unfortunately, babies are finicky even if the products are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Mamaroo won’t turn on, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our baby and have only used it 3 times and it won’t turn on. The first 2 times we used it it worked but would turn off on its own after a few minutes. The 3rd time we used it it wouldn’t turn on at all. I contacted 4moms customer service through email because they aren’t taking phone calls at this time and they will not respond. I’ve emailed them 3 times. I registered my product as soon as I received it and it has a 12 month warranty. I just want a replacement! I can’t believe the poor customer service of such a well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Better things out there for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was hoping this product would be so much better than it has been, especially for the price. I'm sure different babies react differently to this, as it goes with most things with babies and kids. I think the seat isn't very comfortable for my son. He doesn't seem to ever get settled in this thing. The speakers, which were pretty sad to begin with (not loud at all and not good quality), have already stopped working. I'm just hoping at this point that I can sell it for a decent price on Marketplace. My son much prefers his rock n play or his swing so I guess we'll stick with those.
customer_reviews.author: Boudreaux Family

customer_reviews.title: Louder than older model!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe mine is defective and if so, customer service please reach out to me. The older model from a few years ago is virtually silent. Problem is that it’s my sisters and I’m only borrowing it. I loved it so much I decided to purchase my own and unfortunately I’m super disappointed! My motor whines in a soft but high pitched whirring tone. It’s not horrible enough that I think it’s defective, just their new motor. (I will add video and hopefully sound will come across). It isn’t really loud but noticeable enough that it will drive me nuts, especially after living with the other quiet one for a week. The sounds are also different and more harsh, less soothing.
customer_reviews.author: natalie s.

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this, in fact, I was so excited when it arrived, but once baby arrived it was a whole different story. He hated it from the second I put him in it. It didn’t matter what motion I chose, what speed or what sound. He just hated it. I’m sure this works for other babies, but not my little guy. This seems to be a little jerky in its movements, and the mobile above doesn’t do anything. The sounds aren’t that great either. My baby prefers the fisher price cradle swing, it has a moving mobile and lights above it, and it moves smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for our kid, maybe not for yours
customer_reviews.text: The thing about baby stuff is that every baby is different. We bought this for our second child to replace the Fisher Price Rock n Play that was recalled. Pros: Looks cool Bluetooth control Small footprint Great variety of motion Cons: It's pretty loud, even with no sounds playing It does seem fragile, I know there are people who said theirs broke - ours has been good so far under pretty heavy use for about 4 months Expensive The infant insert is sold separately for ~$30, which is ridiculous Overall, it's pricey but the silence is priceless - especially when everyone is at home during a pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Ponzerelli

customer_reviews.title: Brand new, never used, does not turn on.
customer_reviews.text: After all that money spent, we get the thing assembled according to the directions and the damn thing doesn't turn on. Tried a few different power outlets but there's zero life happening, no LCD display, no noise, no nothing. The troubleshooting only suggests that we check if it is plugged in to a power outlet- hilarious. I feel like this is a sick joke since it is such an expensive product with rave reviews and it was a huge hassle for us to get it here through amazon anyway. I am waiting to hear back from 4moms customer care, but if they cannot help me with a defective item then I will be contacting amazon for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Bartle

customer_reviews.title: Less than a week, broken.
customer_reviews.text: Obstruction message happened. My baby is a week old and no one plays with it so there wasn’t any reason for it to be obstructed. Unfortunately, we got this for a baby shower gift so there’s no return/exchange from amazon. So sad to see the quality decline, this was a lifesaver with my firstborn. Hopefully 4moms will honor the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not a miracle
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't want a mamaroo even though it's all the rage. It's so big and expensive. But I bought it in the middle of the night when my sleep deprived brain was willing to try anything so I could to put my baby down. She wouldn't sleep unless being held, especially for naps. I'm not disappointed in the purchase but it wasn't a miracle. Really she just needed some time. My baby will take naps in it but not better than her rockn play. I prefer rock n play because it's easier to move around and I feel like she's more secure as she gets bigger.
customer_reviews.author: KmmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Extremely loud squeak from first day, 4Mom troubleshooting didn't help.
customer_reviews.text: In the one day I've had it, it's developed a very loud squeaking sound that keeps us parents awake! So it defeats the purpose. Baby doesn't seem to mind the squeaking and can sleep through it, but it's a no go for the adults. I called 4Mom support and they said to fix it I should run it for an hour with no weight on it to "get rid of the dust particles in the gears." I don't think dust in the gears would make this kind of noise, but watch the video and decide for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Santokki

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money!!! I am a foster parent and we have used this swing for 6 different babies and been very pleased!!! The NICU have this swing. It is quiet and love that it plugs in. Variety of motions. Easy to clean. The seat zips off and toss it in the wash. Like that the straps are attached to the cover. Very good material that is very soft and durable. We travel with this swing as it is not bulky or very heavy. The app doesn’t work very well. However I don’t need the app.
customer_reviews.author: BLESSED

customer_reviews.title: Spend your $200 on something else!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Mamaroo since our daughter was born 2 months ago. The first one stopped working out of nowhere, it would start going and then stop in a matter of seconds and wouldn’t run anymore. So we bought another one and it’s happened again! My daughter was born premature and still only weighs less than 10lbs so I don’t understand how this “expensive” machine keeps breaking. It’s frustrating and overall very disappointing. The worst part is that she loves it and sleeps so well in it but we just can’t keep it working.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy for the longest time but wish I bought it sooner. My son loves it and still uses it many months later as I write this. We ended up buying one for my mom’s house. Seems expensive at first but actually baby stuff is all extremely pricey (cribs, high chairs, strollers, etc) it’s really not that bad when it comes down to how much use we get out of it. Baby sleeps in it too and keeps him entertained while we do dishes etc. I don’t see how your baby could not like it forever. They might not intially but could grow to like it. Our son liked it from the start. Worth the hype
customer_reviews.author: navdeep gill

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy ... poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked for like a month and started making a squeaky sound. 4moms Customer service did not want to replace base. Issued a return with amazon and got sent a replacement. Replacement did not work from the get go. I do not recommend. Buy a cheaper swing you can easily move around and wonr cause a headache after it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great - Just 3 Complaints. (Wish They Made These for Adults!)
customer_reviews.text: Baby and we love this thing. It's a great way to soothe and occupy baby while doing other things. It was easy to put together following the directions and seems sturdy. Only 3 complaints - 1) the infant insert should be included. It's stupid to have to buy it separately. 2) There should be some sort of shade/sun cover. We put a muslin over the mobile to keep bright light out, but that could be included. 3) Music only plays from an aux-in plug. It should play music via bluetooth. Other than that, this is a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: PB&J

customer_reviews.title: Caught on fire
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed reviews on this item. I do like the swing itself. Iv only had this swing for a few days and the baby seems to like it but it was plugged into a strip with other phone cords and it randomly started smoking and sparking flames. The swing still works but I will be returning it. Very scary.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that works
customer_reviews.text: I waited to get this until after I had the baby. I had an easy baby until 5 weeks old then, he wouldn’t nap for longer than 30-40 minutes, only wanted to be held when sleeping and took 15-30 minutes of being rocked to fall asleep. Totally different than my first. My baby lays in this awake for 20-60 minutes, I put him in it swaddled and let the macaroons spend the 20 minutes rocking him to sleep, and he sometimes takes naps in it soundly with a loud 3 year old running around. My advice, wait to see if your baby needs it, my first wouldn’t have but my second definitely does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 days.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, it’s quiet and it’s easy to move. The issue is quality and customer service. My son used it for all of 4 days before it stopped working. Then when trying to get help via the warranty, the customer care office isn’t accepting calls. They will only accept emails and then it takes 3-4 business days to get a response. I regret this purchase in every way. Now it’s a $200 chair for him because it doesn’t work and customer care won’t respond to my email.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price - keeps my baby occupied and happy while I am busy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby boy is 2 months and we’ve had the mamaroo for about a month now. His favorite settings are kangaroo and car ride. I usually put him in it when I have my hands tied with cooking dinner or cleaning and he enjoys being rocked and still being able to see me. I love seeing his little smiles and coos - I think it was well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: EmWillFish

customer_reviews.title: My kids tell me I'm the best and I know it's because of this...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1st grandson, he is still using it to this day. The other grandparents bought a different version. Want to take a guess which one is in the living room and which one is in a spare bedroom hidden away and probably only brought out when those grandparents visit? They send me facetime videos often of him in it, using different patterns and he loves it. They love the bluetooth option as well. Expensive, sure, but you're getting what you pay for here. This will be handed down to my other son when he has his own children, so to me it was a value purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Meier

customer_reviews.title: Structural Improvements would be nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, does everything it says. However, the concave shape is too much as baby grows past 20 inches, it forces baby's chin to chest making breathing difficult. As it can tilt upward for a more sit up angle, I wish it had a 5pt harness and not just a 3pt at the waist. And for $200+ you would think it would have a powered mobile, but no. Baby got bored quickly after eye sight developed enough to see that far, and none of the motions worked to sooth (bc it was uncomfortable to sit in, don't blame her) This was regifted to a friend after a month.
customer_reviews.author: christopher p.

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fine and it does the trick. But for the price you would think it would have speakers that work. They sound worse than my first iPhone. Also there is a slight shake often. I saw it in the other reviews but thought their must be defective. The shake is real, it’s not bad enough for me to not use it. But if I’m gonna buy the best thing on the market it should be smooth and have speakers that don’t hiss.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Meh. My LO didn’t like it one bit.
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Traded it in for the cheap fisher price swing. This swing is beautiful, compact, SO easy to assemble ... but for some reason my LO did not like it one bit. He wouldn’t sit in it for longer than five minutes. Someone suggested trying out the classic Fisher Price swing so I figured I’d give it a try and BAM...he stays in that thing for like two hours at a time. I can get so much done! So unfortunately I cannot recommend this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Tamminga

customer_reviews.title: 4moms customer support makes everything right.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if baby will like this because she is still a couple of months from her due date, but when the mamaroo arrived it was very easy to put together! The power cord was defective, so I contacted customer support via email. After explaining the problem, providing proof of purchase and a short video of the issue I was overnighted a replacement cord which fixed the issue. I was impressed by the promptness of the company’s support.
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you really do need this!
customer_reviews.text: I wish we had this with my first! I love the different modes and music, plus the footprint on it is so much smaller and perfect for our little house! I strongly recommend the inserts, at least two. My squishy is notorious for blow outs (it's a gift, really) and without the insert, you're having to remove the whole insert to wash making the swing unusable until it's washed and dried and zipped back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Kretzinger

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product thinking it was a good quality and it’s really small by the time My baby six months I’m thinking shes goin to be huge for the swing ... When you connected to the sound system it sounds super low I can just disconnect the iPad and it sounds way louder than the swing itself ...it was very expensive it’s just very cheap quality. I do not like it for the money that I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Aidee

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what all the hype is
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand what all the hype is about this. It doesn’t work for us. I also don’t understand how it has Bluetooth for you to be able to change the mode on it, but not stream music. Who uses an auxiliary cord anymore?!! I would definitely buy this product used for half the price if you want to buy it. You can buy the inserts new if you worry about it being used.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice but the mobile is so flimsy it snapped off, expect more $$
customer_reviews.text: Like this but the mobile is really flawed in a flimsy design, I just bumped the thing and it broke. My newborn has been in it 3 times and for price of this thing I expect more.
customer_reviews.author: KensMom

customer_reviews.title: faulty product
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for my own child that I bought through ebay I never had issues, this one I bought for a baby shower in June for a family member who I was excited to give it to informed me that it does not work, bought a new power supply and product still did not work so I ended up buying her another one off ebay since I bought this ahead of time and missed (before she had her baby) my return date. Not sure why product would not turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard product with artificial movement and does not suit an infant. I asked several of my friends and they also confirmed the same thing with these type of devices.
customer_reviews.author: TONY J GORE

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for parents and grandparents!
customer_reviews.text: It can be kinda of noisy on some settings when on highest setting(5). But thats compared to total silence. In use, the noise isnt a problem. The electrical cord could be a little longer to make repositioning the unit a little easier. It was super easy to pit together and Im a grandma of 68. A wonderful helper for parents and grandparents and all 3 of our grandbabies have loved napping in it. They also are comfortable to just look around and enjoy the ride!!! Get this!!
customer_reviews.author: KBaby

customer_reviews.title: Great swing, sound could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of spending so much on a swing but it seemed to have a lot of features so I did it. My baby loves the tree swing setting on 3. It always gets her down for a nap. However the sound portion is very poor considering the price of this. It sounds like someone used their phone to record sounds off a YouTube video and are playing them back. Just poor sound quality. It’s a good thing my baby isn’t one that needs white noise to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Janie23

customer_reviews.title: Broken after exactly two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Received 1/13/2020. No longer works 1/27/2020. Got to have it set up for 2 weeks. Worked great when we first tested it out. Baby isn’t here yet and we’re already needing a replacement base according to customer service. Only good side is the warranty lasts 1 year so at least through baby’s use. However, this will be a pain if it continues breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchase

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to swing
customer_reviews.text: I knew my baby would like these types of motions vs a traditional swing by the way we calmed her when she was a week old. She liked to be swayed in circles. So this machine is great for that. My baby loves the motions. That said, it is quite expensive. I like the fact that you can adjust the recline from upright to almost flat. For us, I think it was worth it, but for others it might not make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: good entertainment for cranky baby
customer_reviews.text: My son is at the stage where he wants to be held/moving ALL THE TIME. The Mamaroo will entertain him long enough for me to get dressed or do other things around the house, which is a luxury these days! He loves to look at the bright patterned mobile; which is great, because I learned recently that shapes and colors promote brain stimulation in infants. It's easy to assemble, and is actually a lot lighter than I thought it would be. I can also control it from my phone, which is just another added perk!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ann Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product and the company
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product and the company.. The first one was cracked on opening at the base, I started a return and within two days there was a brand new one delivered.. My granddaughter absolutely loves this swing.. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: tayler turpin

customer_reviews.title: Our son hated it
customer_reviews.text: Our son hated it. I guess just not meant for us. Seemed like a great idea, but he would scream like someone is hurting him every time we put him in. FYI he loves car rides and to be rocked. But for some reason didn’t like this. For the price you can buy 2 rockers if not 3
customer_reviews.author: kit deng

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working/Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Momaroo worked for about five days with light use and then stopped working. It suddenly started shaking when being run and then shuts off after a minute or two. I’m in contact with 4moms customer service noe and waiting for them to reply and fix it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Agnes Ceniza

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved this but after a week the thing started to squeak. It wakes our son and defeats the purpose it was made for. I’ve reached out to customer service and they don’t reply. If I could go back I wouldn’t buy this again. Find something else that is more reliable and has a decent customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lang

customer_reviews.title: Sleek bouncing swing with sucky speakers
customer_reviews.text: My son only likes to bounce so naturally any normal baby swing didn’t cut it. He seems to like it so far and loves the mobile. It’s very sleek and looks nice. Speakers suck and the white noise is awful but we won’t use it so no big deal. Plug ins pretty short so you have to have it near a plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: JUNK DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Mamaroos are all the hype and I really wanted one. This think is junk. It cracks after just 4 months of very light use. If I had a dollar for everytime my baby was in it and it started cracking and woke her up I would be very rich. It's also not contoured to fit a baby very comfortably and she slides out the front even strapped in. She will dangle from the front. Do not waste your money. Buy the graco version of this product! Unfortunately I purchased the product halfway through my pregnancy so it was too late to return after the baby was born.
customer_reviews.author: lucky speer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together. Used in the special care hospital so that’s why i got it.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! I hv a preemie and the hospital had this exact one, so i got one! It came 3 days early, was easy to snap together and is such a great size it fits anywhere. I turned it on and it works wonderfully. Baby isn’t home yet, but she will love it. I highly recommend it. I wld also recommend purchasing the “newborn” insert sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: LGgirl

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is not great
customer_reviews.text: It works as it should and a pretty good product if it works for you I guess. My baby doesn’t love it. But I’m giving it 3 stars for the customer service. I initially got an open box one that was missing electric cable. I called to ask if they would send it to me and they offered to purchase one, the cost of, with shipping, will be as if I bought a new one... Also they were pretty unpleasant to communicate with.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Great cat bed
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this product. She sleeps in it all day. Best cat bed I’ve ever bought (except for how expensive it is). I guess my cat just has great taste, figures. My baby on the other hand doesn’t like it. I don’t think the movement is as good as a swing or a bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Defective product straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Just had the baby, and put him in it. Doesn’t work. AT ALL. What is up with these Amazon products being defective? This is bull. So now I will be expected to pay for it to be shipped, and I don’t have the original box anymore. And I don’t really have the time with two babies.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Catherine Schorr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the others have said, don’t waste your money here. I had it for less than a week before it stopped working. It hit the wall when I turned it on and now the entire thing doesn’t work. Just like that. Contacted 4moms and they are now having to have me replace the entire base. What kind of expensive device quits working just because it barely hit an obstruction?? And to have to replace the WHOLE BASE?? Trash. Save your money. Plus, it doesn’t even vibrate. Don’t buy this or you WILL be mad! I’m so so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Wong

customer_reviews.title: The wheel re-invented.  But not needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, BT was easy to connect however, you can’t change modes with out BT. That’s not good. The sound quality is a joke. Shouldn’t even have that option on a $230 machine I expected better. Though some babies might love this machine, our girl preffered the old school swing. So if you can find one to try your baby in first I would. Or buy used from a trusted source.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Must buy, don’t hesistate, buy now! Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Must buy!!! Love, love, love , comforts and lulz lo right to sleep. Way better than those cheap swings and rockers! Looking for the perfect alternative to a swing??! Look no further the mamaroo is it. It will play music and motion at the same time also difrrent modes for example: car ride, wave, tree top, this mamaroo is amazing!!️
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: well built baby swing.
customer_reviews.text: We used traditional style swings with our first 2 kids. With our 3rd baby we decided to try this one simply because the 2 year old wouldn't be able to swing his sister in it. I wish we would've bought this 6 years ago for our first child. It is very well built and seems much safer than a true swing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightly used and broke, but customer service took care of it.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE! They have AMAZING customer service, and are sending us a replacement base for our station. It doesn't usually break down after so short of a time, and my cousin who is a pediatric nurse says they use them non stop at the hospital with no problems. I am very happy with how this was handled by the company, and would recommend them to anyone I know. My baby loves it, and we're able take a break from holding her.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Less than 3 months in and makes a loud clicking sound
customer_reviews.text: We bought in late December for our newborn son. This week it’s started making a loud clicking noise. A quick internet search shows this to be a very common problem. This product should be recalled. I’m about to engage customer support but from what I’ve read that’s not likely to be a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: jheavner

customer_reviews.title: Makes loud popping noises and squeaking noises
customer_reviews.text: Ive only had it for a little over a month and my newborn loves it. I've only used it a few times and it started making this loud popping and squeaking noise and it wakes my baby up every time it pops I'm very upset because I spent so much money on this thing that I hardly could afford and I'm so afraid it's going to stop working. I can't afford another 1.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Love our mamaroo
customer_reviews.text: A Newborn must have!! When baby gets fussy while waiting for milk this keeps him calm. It also is great when he’s ready to fall asleep
customer_reviews.author: Shopqueen

customer_reviews.title: It will break!
customer_reviews.text: Well it just stopped working after only having it for 3 months. I had only put my infant in it few times before it started making a noise when it is in motion then eventually it just shuts off anytime I have it move. It is a $200 piece of junk. I should have bought an old school swing.
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product but my Baby Doesn't Like it
customer_reviews.text: The swing is nice and easy to assembly, which is a plus. The negatives are that it is noisey, especially when you turn up the speed, and the music function just sounds like random noise. I guess it's mainly for the option to connect your own music. My little one doesn't like it. He is 4 weeks old now, so I am hoping he likes it the older he gets. I put him in a regular swing at a baby store, and he was quiet and calm...lol...and he cried within minutes of this swing. Like I said it is a cool concept and easy to assemble, but just like any other product, it doesn't work for all.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Baby Swing!
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth option is kind of gimmicky and I doubt I’ll use it but it’s fun. Otherwise an extremely useful product. Sleek design, well built, and doesn’t take up a lot of room like most baby swings.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Elam

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: This swing is far too overrated. I bought it myself then gifted it to someone else per their request. Although I had warned them it’s not that great. The idea of having something with more natural movements sounds wonderful but my daughter did not enjoy this swing at all. And now 6 months in with hardly using it the first 3 months this swing makes a loud thumping noise it’s so obnoxious and sounds like it’ll break down any day now.
customer_reviews.author: Bushra A.

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This product came and it worked perfectly. I loved this item. I only had it for 3 months and out of nowhere heard a clanking noise coming from bottom where it slides. Then after a day and a half it stopped working. It won’t turn on at all it just completely stopped working. My baby is not over weight and I never moved this item from the spot it was in. There is no reason it should’ve stopped working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I had heard about these from some moms who said they were amazing. When I saw two of them in the nursery at the hospital and the babies sleeping soundly I ordered one. It was pretty neat for a few weeks but my little never really liked it much. Then after eight weeks it stopped working. We really only used it for 6 weeks, maybe fifteen hours total.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t originally get this but decided to spring for it after my 1 month old didn’t love other swings. This thing is great!!! Underestimated how clutch controlling it from my phone would be while pumping or eating. I think it’s probably baby-dependent but my guy loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith E.

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING!!!! I ordered this item and received it TODAY, it has pee/poop stains as well as baby spit up stains. ITS USED!!!!!!! also a ball is missing from the mobile. This is ridiculous to pay for this item, and receive this crap! DO NOT BUY from amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle greene

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was a little doubtful that this was a necessary item, but once we bought it, we loved it! Easy to assemble and disassemble, machine washable fabric, and it will definitely give you some free time as your kid is being rocked to sleep in it. Would recommend for use.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great technology
customer_reviews.text: This works fantastically . Unfortunately our baby did not magically fall asleep while using this so we ended up not keeping it. Works for most babies though 🤷🏼‍♀️ I really wanted it to work. Smallest foot print. Very slim. Loved that it connects to an app you can control via your phone.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Meh..Cheaply made, not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: It's fine and it works but it's pretty clear from the cracking sounds the joints make and the struggling motor sounds that it's not very well made. For the price, you would expect the speakers (a main function) to work. The speakers are truly awful. They hardly make any noise and you can barley tell the difference between the different noises. Final verdict: Spent last week at a house that had a $30 chair that vibrated and bounced naturally on a spring. Worked just as well if not better. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Max Menke

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price...
customer_reviews.text: This product stops working after a few months. The monitor was going in and out and won’t even power on. The last time my baby used this swing was at 7 months and she was only 14lbs so her weight was not factoring into why the swing is not functioning correctly. It serves no purpose to spend $115 on a replacement base.
customer_reviews.author: peanut gang

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, to much money the to does not spin on its own and the baby won’t reach it to spin it. The music that comes with it sounds like crap. The top should have light s and should have a little motor to spin the toys hangin
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Base was defective on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The base was broken when we got it. It worked for about an hour before shutting off. We were able to get a replacement from the manufacturer, but it took several days.
customer_reviews.author: MN traveler

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are junky but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely loving this swing except the Sound quality on the speakers is not good. Also, to me it kind of seems like all the different “swing/rocking” options are all doing the same thing bummer but not a big deal since baby just cares about swinging.
customer_reviews.author: Redeemed

customer_reviews.title: Started making loud clicking noise!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing but it started making a loud noise a few days ago. It defeats one of the main purposes of why I got it! I loved all the options and how it doesn’t have those wide legs and can get unlevel and the motor was quite. However, it started making like a loud clicking noise, it’s very annoying and my baby won’t sleep in it since it clicks the seat and makes that loud noise. I believe it’s one of the gears in it. I’m very upset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love having it
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to put together and connect to my phone. My baby doesn’t sit in it much because he prefers “skin to skin”. It is a very convenient seat though. I love how I can control it from my phone while I’m in the next room (I.e. while I’m cleaning and need to sit my little one down)
customer_reviews.author: Lonicia Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: We went through three of these things before our kid was even born. One stopped working the second time we tried turning it on. One had a broken speaker and bluetooth. One wouldn't move. Fourth time was a charm, but it turns out our kid didn't like it. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: just bought this

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: So my baby hated this! She just screamed whenever we put her in it. The mobile is cheap and bends over and I can see it getting worse and worse. The sound quality was awful... the motions aren't very good in my opinion. I resold it to a friend whose baby likes it but I really don't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged! Very upset considering i waited for this item and really needed it for my son. Item was desribed as used in NEW condition NOT used and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Sumrall

customer_reviews.title: Babies love em
customer_reviews.text: We watch children in our home and this has been a godsend. The babies love it so much we bought another one. Expensive but worth it. Not a fan of the noises but the babies seem to like them. The app is surprisingly useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jhicks75

customer_reviews.title: All In The Quality!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Can control the entire swing with phone from anywhere in the house. Also love the mp3 hook up so we can customize our own music and sounds. Quality product and very easy to assemble. Lighter than it looks and is easy to move from room to room and up and down stairs. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: kirsty prater

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Open Box Item For My Grand Babies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter found this gem. I never tried an open box item before and it did not disappoint. Just like brand new. Besides that it has been opened there is nothing wrong with it. Great find and my grand babies absolutely love it. With having twins to take care this is my lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: B. E.

customer_reviews.title: Buttons
customer_reviews.text: No complaints except for the easy access for older siblings to turn on/off or change the movement! Wish it had an easier “lock” like my washer/ dryer! Otherwise great. Smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sandhills

customer_reviews.title: Consistent shaking after 1 week of use
customer_reviews.text: This mamaroo worked great for about a week and then it started to shake when going up or down. Once it started shaking it remained consistent. I sent it back to amazon and they sent me a new one within a week. After having the replacement, it’s becoming a similar story. I was hoping that the first one I purchased was just a lemon but it turns out they are both having major quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not for every baby
customer_reviews.text: So it’s seems this swing works for some babies , but it doesn’t worked for mine. He didn’t like it! Stay for 5 min. in it and start crying. It a good design and I wanted to love it but unfortunately I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: DelyanZ

customer_reviews.title: Never used myself but have bought 3 of these as gifts...
customer_reviews.text: For our various expecting friends and all three of them have raved about it. I understand it might not be for all babies and some did not like the motion. But from what I'm told, it works very well to soothe the baby especially during the infant stage. Once they get to 5-6 months, it seems they are too active to want to sit still in it. But my friends have called it a "god send" during those initial few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work and they don’t bother to test it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a waste of time, the item doesn’t even work. It was used and the price was the same as I ordered a new one from 4moms. I was excited because it was quick shipping, but after installed it and download the App the whole thing doesn’t even bother to move properly. At least test the product before you send it out. It was packed horribly... it okay I fixed it when I sent it back, hopefully they fix it or get rid of it and not waste someone time and energy.
customer_reviews.author: NoSu

customer_reviews.title: My baby does not like it
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it but my baby hates it. Very easy to assemble.. very light.. takes little space. *It's kind of louder than I prefer but not super annoying. Has an app which makes it easier....honestly wish my baby liked it but he prefers his swaying swing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Total pile. These guys spent way too much time on the futuristic stuff and not enough on the basics. The first one started squeaking after a few hours; the next didn’t even turn on after a few uses. Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE. PIECE OF CRAP.
customer_reviews.text: Irritated. Worked fine when I set it up. Weeks later when I was showing my parents how it worked, it wasn’t working. Must be defective. I did everything to troubleshoot it. Super disappointed and irritated that I have to waste time sending it back before baby arrives. When I press the speed buttons, the LED screen turns off and the swing doesn’t move. Tried moving it to several other outlets, nope! Still not working. Annoying!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Finally a swing for reflux babies!
customer_reviews.text: The only swing my lo will use. He has collic and acid reflux, the adjustable inclined seat is where its at if you have a reflux baby. He only really likes one setting (the Rockabye) but as long as he's happy, im happy. Now I can do the dishes without a baby in my arms! I was sceptical of the price, but I'd pay it again for this much peace.
customer_reviews.author: renaebentley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT so Far
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box, I panicked a little about the assembly. However, I shouldn't have! It was SO EASY TO ASSEMBLE. The app is very easy to use and within minutes my phone was connected to control movements and sounds. I do think it would be nice if it came with the newborn insert, but I'll be purchasing that separately. I haven't heard of any baby disliking the mamaRoo.
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a present for a baby shower party The reason we did this is cause we had one of these before for my baby girl (4yrs now) And we loved it For me was easy to assemble Easy to move For wife was a little bit on the heavier side but was a small compliant compare to the big help this product is I recommend this product 👍
customer_reviews.author: MOISES IBARRA-ROJAS

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER!
customer_reviews.text: This swing is amazing. I like that my son sleeps solidly in it and gets comfortable quickly. The varying motions are super soothing for baby. It's also sleek and modern looking and doesn't take up much space. Hoping it lasts long!
customer_reviews.author: A.S

product_meta.title: 4moms mamaRoo 4 Baby Swing | Bluetooth Baby Rocker with 5 Unique Motions | Smooth, Nylon Fabric | Grey Classic
product_meta.description:
It moves like you do. The 4moms mamaRoo 4 infant seat bounces up and down and sways from side to side, just like parents do when comforting their baby. Select from five unique motions, like car ride and tree swing, and five different speeds. Choose from four built-in sounds or connect it to any MP3 player. The seat reclines to multiple positions to allow baby to lie back and relax or sit up and play. The mamaRoo is also Bluetooth enabled so you can control the motion, sound, speed and volume from your compatible smart device without disturbing baby! The overhead toy mobile now includes interactive, reversible toy balls. Keep baby’s attention with the sound of the crinkle ball, rattle or reflective mirror ball. Compatibility: The 4moms app for iOS is compatible with all Apple devices newer than the iPhone 4s that are running iOS 9 or newer. The native Android app is compatible with most Android devices that support Bluetooth Low Energy and are running Android 4.3 or newer.



The mamaRoo is an infant seat used to comfort, soothe and entertain your baby. It is not a sleeper, nor intended for overnight sleep, since it is neither a flat surface (there is always a slight recline), nor a firm surface, as recommended by pediatricians. Never leave your child unattended.
feature_bullets: Weight Range: Birth to 25lbs (or when baby can sit up unassisted)
From the makers of the mamaRoo

specifications.Additional product features: Adjustable speed settings, reclining seat, machine washable seat pad, ability to plug in, sounds and songs, multi--directional seat positions, multiple swing motions
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,907 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
